contact.title: Contact
contact.paragraphe:
For any questions: whether it is a request for help, a suggestion for improvement, a bug found, a request for information, etc.
Send us an email
contact.quickResponse: We will try to answer you quickly, promise!

partner.title: Partner search
partner.explain: Coming in a new region, looking for someone to climb with, in the gym or outdoor? You may find happiness here!
partner.connect: To see registered climbers, you have to register your own account !

configuration.title: Step 1 : My profile
configuration.body: If you want other people to contact you, you need to add a few information about you, which style (bouldering, artif, routes, bigwall..) wich grade you like to climb,...

location.title: Step 2 : Climbing area
location.body:
To show you climbers around you, we need to know first where you are climbing !
You can make a list of your climbing spots, Oblyk will show you climbers around you.

climberMap.title: Step 3 : Climbers map
climberMap.body: Now you have filled your climbing spot and tilled us more about you, you can use le climbers map to find someone you'd like to climb with.

contact.title: Step 4 : Contact
contact.body:
Did you find someone to climb with? Send him a message with Oblyk messenger.
Free to you to set up as you want.
